snippet: Alfonso Soriano was hitless in his first four games this season, but he has been hot since recording his first hit, continuing a career resurgence with the Yankees.
abstract: Outfielder Alfonso Soriano was hitless in his first four games this season, but has been hot since recording his first hit, continuing a career resurgence with the New York Yankees; Soriano’s two hits, including a home run, are part of the offensive onslaught in the Yankees’ 7-4 victory against the Boston Red Sox.
lead_paragraph: Alfonso Soriano was hitless in his first four games this season, but he has been hot since recording his first hit, continuing a career resurgence with the Yankees.

headline.main: Revived Soriano Remains Consistently Streaky Force for Yankees
headline.print_headline: Revived Soriano Remains Consistently Streaky Force
